leftSection_5.title: Our 4-Step Process to Simplify Business Setup & Ensure Compliance

items.title: Consultation & Needs Assessment
items.description: We begin by understanding your business, goals, and regulatory requirements to tailor nominee services that match your exact needs.

items.title: Nominee Selection & Agreement
items.description: Next, we carefully appoint a qualified nominee director or shareholder and formalize the arrangement through a legally binding agreement to protect your ownership.

items.title: Registration & Compliance Setup
items.description: Our team handles all documentation, regulatory filings, and formalities to ensure your nominee arrangement meets UAE corporate and licensing requirements seamlessly.

items.title: Ongoing Support & Control
items.description: Finally, you retain full beneficial ownership and decision-making authority while we provide continuous support to keep your business compliant and confidential.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What are nominee services in the UAE?
items.answer: Nominee services allow you to appoint a trusted individual or entity to fulfill formal corporate roles such as director or shareholder, while you retain full beneficial ownership and control.

items.question: Are nominee directors and shareholders legally recognized?
items.answer: Yes. All nominees are appointed through formal agreements and registered with UAE authorities, fully compliant with local corporate regulations.

items.question: Do nominee services affect my ownership rights?
items.answer: No. You remain the beneficial owner with full decision-making authority, financial control, and legal rights over the company.

items.question: What roles can a nominee fulfill?
items.answer: Nominees can act as directors, shareholders, secretaries, or managers, depending on your business structure and compliance needs.

items.question: How long does it take to set up nominee services?
items.answer: Typically, nominee arrangements can be completed within a few days to a couple of weeks, depending on documentation and regulatory approvals.
